hanzi-su-wiki:
連

Значения

Брать с собой; стоять в ряд, тянуться цепью; ставить в ряд, брать с собой; объединение

Мнемоника

  • Движение 辶 связанных телег 車 гуськом. Нужен всего один погонщик. Примыкать.

  • "Они ехали на автомобиле 車 по дороге, объединяющей их дома."

Варианты

连
purpleculture_pinyin:
lián
to link; to join; to connect; continuously; in succession; including; (used with 也 , 都 etc) even; company (military)
связывать; присоединиться; подключить; непрерывно; в последовательности; включая; (используется с 也, 都 и т. д.) даже; компания (военная)
rtega_mnemonic:
連連RS
连连		join, connect, continuous, even, lead
  • going ⻌ by car 車 one is connected to the world; when going ⻌ by car 車 the wheels 車 have to turn continuously; move ⻌ a bunch of soldiers by car 車: lead them into battle
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 连)
Antonyms: 斷
Ideographic: A cart 車 moving 辶 goods between cities

    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
heisig_keyword: take along | брать с собой, соединять, быть лидером
heisig_chinese_memo: Cars on a road just come one after another.
heisig_story: What you are meant to take along in this kanji are not things but people. The image of the car on the road should ground your image for picking up your friends to take them along to wherever you are going.
Keyword_KKLC:
LINK, connect
IN SUCCESSION, in a row
Keyword_KANJIDIC: take along, lead, join, connect, party, gang, clique
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: взять с собой, свинец, соединения, коммутации, партия, банда, Клика
koohiiStory1: When you put your car on the road you should always take along a few friends. Don´t confuse with carry (#303).
koohiiStory2: This kanji also means "linked" or "series" so I´ve changed the kanji meaning to "GO ALONG (WITH EACH OTHER)." Well, a ROAD and a CAR certainly GO ALONG with each other. And the CAR will help you to GO ALONG the ROAD. This Kanji is the "Union" in Soviet Union and the "United" of United Nations (the countries that "go along with each other" at least some of the time).
kunYomi: つら.なる、つら.ねる、つ.れる、-づ.れ

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Both a scooter and a car. These are both things you'll take along with you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You can't decide which one you want, so you take along both.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You take along the things you need. Anything else, you can do a rental (れん) for.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You remembered your scooter and your car, but you forgot something else! You go to the rental shop and do a rental for that item.
Ru_Russian: выстраивать, вытягивать в цепь, вести, связывать
Ru_Meaning: take along, lead, join, connect, party, gang, clique
Ru_trainchinese:

lián: (союз) (служит для усиления) даже с учетом...; вместе с, включая
lián: (нареч) несколько раз, подряд, один за другим, беспрерывно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the car (車) moves (⻌) and takes you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Cars on a road just come one after another.
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from the " car " from " Chuo ", " Chuo anti write next." " Stop " is like a human foot, and it means that people can walk in a cart (see Duan Yucai).

"Said Wen": "Lian, the member company. From the car to the car." Duan Yucai changed to "The car is also to bear." The note goes: "The car is to be in the old school." , The car behind is like a negative. The word is from the car to know it, but from the car to know it. People and cars are inextricably related, so the extension is a conjunction."

The inscriptions in gold mean the meaning of alliance, and Neng Yuan: "Lianzhe (all) corpses (barbarian)" means to form alliance with all barbarians. "Mencius. "Li Lou": "The princes are second." Zhao Qi's note: "The princes are the ones who follow." Also used as a name.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " car " from " Chuo ", " Chuo anti write next." " Stop " is like a human foot, and it means that people can walk in a cart (see Duan Yucai).
humanum_full_description:
金文從「車」從「辵」，「辵」旁反寫。「止」象人腳，會人拉車行走之意(參段玉裁)。

　　《說文》：「連，員連也。从辵从車。」段玉裁改為「負車也」，注云：「連即古文輦也。」「負車者，人輓車而行，車在後如負也。字从辵車會意，猶輦从㚘車會意也。人與車相屬不絕，故引伸為連屬字。」

　　金文表示結盟之義，能原鎛：「連者(諸)尸(夷)」，表示與諸夷結盟。《孟子．離婁》：「連諸侯者次之。」趙岐注：「連諸侯，合從者也。」又用作人名。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「車」從「辵」，「辵」旁反寫。「止」象人腳，會人拉車行走之意(參段玉裁)。

連隊 [ lián duì ]: company (of troops)

①相接：連日。連夜。連年。連亙(接連不斷)。連襟(姐妹的丈夫之間的親戚關係)。連載。連綴。連理。烽火連天。連篇累(l噄)牘。
②帶，加上：連帶。連坐(一個人犯法，他的家屬、親族、鄰居連帶受處罰)。
③就是，既使，甚至於：連我都不信。
④聯合：外連東吳。
⑤軍隊的編制單位，“排”的上一級：連長。
⑥姓氏。
⑦古同“璉”，古代宗廟盛黍稷的器具。
⑧古同“鏈”，鉛礦。

金文從「 車 」從「 辵 」，「 辵 」旁反寫。「 止 」象人腳，會人拉車行走之意(參段玉裁)。 《說文》：「連，員連也。从辵从車。」段玉裁改為「負車也」，注云：「連即古文輦也。」「負車者，人輓車而行，車在後如負也。字从辵車會意，猶輦从㚘車會意也。人與車相屬不絕，故引伸為連屬字。」 金文表示結盟之義，能原鎛：「連者(諸)尸(夷)」，表示與諸夷結盟。《孟子．離婁》：「連諸侯者次之。」趙岐注：「連諸侯，合從者也。」又用作人名。
Inscriptions from the " car" from " Chuo", " Chuo anti write next." " Stop" is like a human foot, and it means that people can walk in a cart (see Duan Yucai). "Said Wen": "Lian, the member company. From the car to the car." Duan Yucai changed to "The car is also to bear." The note goes: "The car is to be in the old school." , The car behind is like a negative. The word is from the car to know it, but from the car to know it. People and cars are inextricably related, so the extension is a conjunction." The inscriptions in gold mean the meaning of alliance, and Neng Yuan: "Lianzhe (all) corpses (barbarian)" means to form alliance with all barbarians. "Mencius. "Li Lou": "The princes are second." Zhao Qi's note: "The princes are the ones who follow." Also used as a name.

連字的基本解释

連
lián
见“连”。

連字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》力延切，平仙，來。］
“连1”的繁体字。
(1)古代一种人拉的车。
(2)联合；连络。
(3)连接。
(4)连续。
(5)连缀；串联。
(6)指缝，缝补。
(7)牵连；连累。
(8)姻亲关系。
(9)指牲畜交配。
(10)属于。
(11)连获；兼得。
(12)遍；满。
(13)未炼之铅。
(14)蚕种纸。
(15)军队的编制单位，由若干排组成。
(16)古代行政区划名。
(17)古州名。今广东省连县一带。
(18)古州名。今四川省筠连县一带。参见“連州”。
(19)连翘的本名。
(20)黄连的省称。
(21)介词。表示包括，全部在内。
(22)介词。表示强调，下文常有“多”、“也”等与之呼应，含有甚至于之意。
(23)介词。犹自，从。
(24)量词。
(25)通“璉”。古代盛黍稷的祭器。
(26)通“槤”。横木关柱。
(27)通“漣”。流泪貌。
(28)通“漣”。微波。参见“連漪

連字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　連； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1259第01
【唐韻】力延切【集韻】【韻會】陵延切【正韻】靈年切，?音漣。【說文】員連也。【玉篇】合也，及也。【廣韻】續也，還也。【集韻】屬也。【正韻】接也。【詩·大雅】執訊連連。【朱傳】屬續貌。【禮·王制】十國爲連，連有帥。【齊語】四里爲連，十連爲鄕。【後漢·韓康傳】連徵不至。　又姻親爲連。【史記·尉佗傳】及蒼梧秦王有連。【註】有連者，連姻也。　又黏鳥曰連。【淮南子·覽㝠訓】連鳥于百仞之上。　又連尹、連敖，皆楚官名。【左傳·襄十五年】屈蕩爲連尹。【史記·淮隂侯傳連敖註】楚司馬官也。　又連山，易名。【周禮·春官·大卜】掌三易之法，一曰連山。【註】其卦以純艮爲首，山上山下，是名連山。　又鉛之未鍊者曰連。【史記·貨殖傳】長沙出連錫。　又祈連，山名。【前漢·霍去病傳】出北地，至祈連山。【註】卽天山也。　又【韻會】州名。漢屬桂陽郡，隋置連州。　又姓。【左傳·莊八年】齊有連稱。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力展切，音斂。難也。【易·蹇卦】往蹇來連。【註】連，亦難也。又

Basic explanation of words
even
lián
See "lian".
even
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" Li Yanqie, Pingxian, come. ]
Traditional characters for "连1".
(1) A kind of cart pulled by a man in ancient times.
(2) United; contact.
(3) Connection.
(4) Continuous.
(5) Concatenation; concatenation.
(6) Finger stitching and stitching.
(7) Involvement; Involvement.
(8) In-law relationship.
(9) Refers to the mating of livestock.
(10) Belonging to.
(11) Successive gains; both gains.
(12) times; full.
(13) Unrefined lead.
(14) Silkworm seed paper.
(15) The organization unit of the army consists of several platoons.
(16) Names of ancient administrative divisions.
(17) The name of the ancient state. Today Lian County, Guangdong Province.
(18) The name of the ancient state. This is the area around Junlian County, Sichuan Province. See "Lianzhou".
(19) The real name of Forsythia.
(20) The provincial name of Coptis.
(21) Prepositions. Means including, all inclusive.
(22) Prepositions. It is emphasized that the following words often have "duo" and "ye" in response to it, and even mean it.
(23) Prepositions. Still since, since.
(24) Quantifiers.
(25) Through "Lian". The sacrificial vessel of ancient millet.
(26) Through "梿". Hengmu Guanzhu.
(27) Through "Lian". Tearful appearance.
(28) Through "Lian". microwave. See "Lian Yi
even
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　 Lian; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1259 No. 01
【Tang Yun】Li Yanqie 【Ji Yun】【Yunhui】Ling Yanqie 【Zheng Yun】The spiritual year cut,? Yinlian. [Said the text] Staff even. [Jade articles] He Ye, Ji Ye. [Guang Yun] Continued, also also. [Jiyun] belongs to it. [Zheng Yun] Connect also. 【Poetry·Daya】Conducted again and again. [Zhu Chuan] is a continued appearance. [Rite·Royal System] The ten countries are a company, and there are even handsome. [Qiyu] Sili is Lian, and Shilian is Yin. [The Legend of the Later Han·Han Kang] Continuing to conquer.　In-laws are also in-laws. [Historical Records · Wei Tuo Biography] and Cangwu Qin Wang Youlian. [Note] Those who have a connection, even marriage.　Then the bird said Lian. [Huainanzi·Lan 㝠 Xun] Even the birds are above a hundred ren.　Lian Yin and Lian Ao again, they are all official names of Chu. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Fifteen Years] Qu Dang became Lian Yin. [Historical Records · Huaiyin Hou Chuan Lian Ao Note] Chu Sima Guan also.　Lianshan again, renamed. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Da Bu】The method of palm three changes, one is Lianshan. lián
вм. 连

連

Значения

Брать с собой; стоять в ряд, тянуться цепью; ставить в ряд, брать с собой; объединение

Мнемоника

  • Движение 辶 связанных телег 車 гуськом. Нужен всего один погонщик. Примыкать.

  • "Они ехали на автомобиле 車 по дороге, объединяющей их дома."

Варианты

连

Radicals: 車  (car, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
Both a scooter and a car. These are both things you'll take along with you.
You can't decide which one you want, so you take along both.
Reading Mnemonic
You take along the things you need. Anything else, you can do a rental (れん) for.
You remembered your scooter and your car, but you forgot something else! You go to the rental shop and do a rental for that item.
